channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Girls’ Steep Decline In Desire For Marriage Is The Destabilizing Consequence Of Feminization
item.description: Feminism, abortion, the decline in Christianity, the normalization of cohabitation, and rising divorce all played roles in this phenomenon.

item.title: Backlash over dead cat turns into movement to allow local bans of self-driving cars
item.description: Autonomous vehicle company Waymo is in hot water after one of its self-driving taxis ran over a beloved San Francisco bodega cat.

item.title: Indiana Gov. Braun tells Trump he won't give up on the redistricting plan stalled in state Senate

item.title: Judge threatens DHS program that lets states scrub noncitizens from voter lists
item.description: A federal judge on Monday questioned the legality of allowing states to check their voting lists against Homeland Security's citizenship database, but...

item.title: Don’t Let Anti-Immigrant Sentiment Turn America Against People
item.description: Don’t try to solve housing shortages or worker frustrations by having fewer Americans.

item.title: Trump’s Overdue Tariff Rollback
item.description: It would behoove the administration to apply the logic of the latest relief more broadly.

item.title: Arizona Republicans Introduce Constitutional Amendment To End Post-Election Day Counting ‘Chaos’

item.title: Tennessee Teacher Who Mocked Charlie Kirk’s Assassination Got Her Job Back
item.description: Emily Orbison was reinstated on Nov. 11. She will receive back pay dating to Sept. 15, according to a district reinstatement letter.

item.title: GOP Should Be More Concerned About Congress’s Failure To Deliver Trump’s Mandate Than Infighting
item.description: Republicans have a majority and are doing nothing with it.

item.title: The Case for War Against the Venezuelan Regime
item.description: A prospect as weighty as war should be handled by the administration with the sobriety and earnestness it deserves.

item.title: Is Bondi Saying Her DOJ’s Prior ‘Exhaustive’ Epstein Review Was a Sham?
item.description: The Justice Department is in the business of investigating crime, not the business of conducting political opposition research.

item.title: Court Ruling Strikes a Blow Against Civil Rights Enforcement
item.description: A misapplication of the First Amendment has led to an injustice.
